title: Lighter Thai green vegetable curry
description: Packed with flavourful ingredients, lighter coconut milk makes this a healthier twist on a Thai favourite.Each serving provides 358 kcal, 14g protein, 47g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars), 11.5g fat (of which 5g saturates), 6g fibre and 2.1g salt.
ingredients: ½ green pepper, cut into thin slices
50g/1¾oz baby corn, halved or cut into quarters, depending on size
juice of 1 lime, plus lime wedges to serve
handful finely chopped fresh coriander, to serve
